Reviews.Title: 20 minutes and it was working just as described
Reviews.Author: Techman
Reviews.Content: Only took 20 minutes and I was recording my cameras.You can use almost any IP camera and I used 1.3mp Sony cameras and picture is superb.Can't go wrong with HP.  Nice warranty too.

ProductInfo.Features:
1TB of IP video storage Record all 4 cameras at high resolution for 30 days
4 Pre-loaded Milestone XProtectEssential camera licenses
Protected by a 5-Year on-site next business day HP warranty including the hard drives and firmware updates Coverage provided by HP global service team
View and control video on your mobile devices from anywhere in the world
Every unit hand built in the USA and fully tested prior to shipment
ProductInfo.Name: Video Storage Solutions VSS8300-1TB-4ES VSS Ready To Use IP Video Recorder (Black)
